query:
ALTER TABLE news 
ADD COLUMN slug VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
ADD COLUMN summary TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN coverImage TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN category VARCHAR(100) NULL,
ADD COLUMN isPublished BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3ymh12nCSeHu8Na.root --database nb9WvzpHUTfcigQwoxqRAZ --execute ALTER TABLE news 
ADD COLUMN slug VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
ADD COLUMN summary TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN coverImage TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN category VARCHAR(100) NULL,
ADD COLUMN isPublished BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE;
